overview:
From an early age I have always had a passion for emerging technologies and in particular within the field of IT. This interest led me to recently embark upon a Masterâ€™s degree in Advanced Computer Science at the University of Manchester. During my period at University I have developed my business skills by both working in industry on summer placement and for my gap year developing my own web based business, serving the sector of vacation home rentals (reference www.wigwamchief.com).

Following successful completion of my Masterâ€™s Degree I wish to continue to develop my knowledge and capabilities within the I.T. environment, with passion I would like to work for a company developing new technologies.

Specialities: Strong skills in many areas of Web Enterprise Development. Particular strength with conceptualising and integrating new and innovative web revenue streams.

Programming Languages: Substantial knowledge of: OO/PHP, SQL, HTML, CSS, JavaScript/JQuery. Sound experience with: Java, PL/SQL, Python, XML, WXS, DTD, XSLT, XQuery and XPath expressions
